title: Larry Weston: Complete and Uncut
description: “Complete and Uncut.” That was exactly how Larry liked the men he bedded. Making his way in the world, he is hired at an Italian restaurant where the waiters are as spicy as the cuisine. A sexy boss with an unquenchable desire for his waiters, as well as a regular customer always in the company of young men and looking for more, Larry’s job takes some interesting turns, and ultimately leads him to a place he never thought he would be.
author: Duncan More
